mapper.insert: insert into review(gid, subject, writer, content, regdate, img, rate) values(#{gid},#{subject},#{writer},#{content},NOW(),#{img},#{rate})
mapper.select: select * from review where gid = #{gid} order by regdate desc limit #{start},#{cnt}
select count(*) from review where gid = #{id}
mapper.update: update review set content = #{content} where id = #{id}
